name: Succubus Racing
description:
Introduction to gameplayPlayers need to control the sexy succubus to drive the car to drift on the twisty track. During the driving of the car, you also need to avoid obstacles of various red squares. If you accidentally collide with the obstacles, your health will be deducted. When the health drops to 0, the game ends. Every time the game ends, the number of laps to complete the track will be accumulated, and various "CGs" can be unlocked according to this number of laps!
The game has up to 9 different CG videos, all of which are 6-22 minutes long. When you don't want to race, you can enter the succubus' room and have various intimate interactions with her! 9 different interactive contents and 3 poses can be switched freely, and no props are required to unlock! You can set the ratio between the various body parts of the succubus, such as the chest can be resized at will. 5 different perspectives can be switched during drifting! Only need to use "W,A,S,D" 4 keys to play the game, can fully realize one-handed mode!
